name: NURD Symbol/Footprint Library
description: KiCad content package with symbols, (optional) footprints and 3D models; standardized attributes for sourcing (MPN, MF, S1 fields).
description_full:
NURD-Template packaged as a KiCad content library.

Includes:
- symbols/  (KiCad .kicad_sym libraries)
- footprints/  (optional; KiCad .pretty libraries)
- 3dmodels/  (optional; STEP/WRL models)

Symbols contain standardized non-default attributes used for procurement and documentation, such as MPN, MF, S1 Description, S1 Part number, S1 Part link, and S1 Price @ 100.
